name: Irma. The Game (Cat Game)
description:
Irma. The Game was originally intended for the Christmas Jam 2018, but I was a little slow, because I decided to try out the Phaser 3 framework for HTML5 games. 

But here it is anyway ;)

You play as Irma, the cat, in her never ending goal to catch all the yellow tennis balls while avoiding the evil dog shaped flower pots out to get her. 

Asset credits: 

Open Pixel Project 2017 - Village and Room (http://www.openpixelproject.com/)
Shapardskin - Cat Sprites (https://opengameart.org/content/cat-sprites)
loltsilol - Tennisball (https://opengameart.org/content/tennisball
Aswino - Plant Pets (https://opengameart.org/content/plant-pets
Bensound - Funky Suspense (https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/funky-suspense)
